column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=My sons and I were invited by their grandmother to come for a visit .
#id=2
#text=We decided to fly across the country .
#id=3
#text=We went to the airport and purchased plane tickets .
#id=4
#text=Then we went home and packed our suitcases .
#id=5
#text=The next day we took a cab to the airport and hour early .
#id=6
#text=We went to the airlines check in area an waited in line to show our tickets , get our seat assignments and check out bags .
#id=7
#text=The we headed upstairs to the airplane gate .
#id=8
#text=There were many people flying on this plane and the waiting room was crowded .
#id=9
#text=Then the plane pulled in next to the gate and the flight attendant started calling people over to board the plane .
#text=We were near last to get on the plane .
#text=Once on the plane we found our seats and sat down .
#text=After the plane took off the stewardess did a demonstration about how to use the emergency exits .
#text=Then we sat back and flew all the way to Reno , NV where we were picked up from the airport by grandma .
